member.name: T:Owin.Loader.DefaultLoader
member.summary: Locates the startup class based on the following convention: AssemblyName.Startup, with a method named Configuration

member.name: M:Owin.Loader.DefaultLoader.#ctor(System.Func{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder}})
member.summary: Allows for a fallback loader to be specified.

member.name: M:Owin.Loader.DefaultLoader.#ctor(System.Func{System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String},System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder}},System.Func{System.Type,System.Object})
member.summary: Allows for a fallback loader and a Dependency Injection activator to be specified.

member.name: M:Owin.Loader.DefaultLoader.Load(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: Executes the loader, searching for the entry point by name.
member.param: The name of the assembly and type entry point

member.name: T:Owin.Loader.NullLoader
member.summary: A default fallback loader that does nothing.

member.name: M:Owin.Loader.NullLoader.Load(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.String})
member.summary: A placeholder method that always returns null.

member.name: P:Owin.Loader.NullLoader.Instance
member.summary: A singleton instance of the NullLoader type.

member.name: T:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.AssemblyNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to For the app startup parameter value '{0}', the assembly '{1}' was not found..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.ClassNotFoundInAssembly
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to For the app startup parameter value '{0}', the class '{1}' was not found in assembly '{2}'..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.Exception_AttributeNameConflict
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The OwinStartup attribute discovered in assembly '{0}' referencing startup type '{1}' conflicts with the attribute in assembly '{2}' referencing startup type '{3}' because they have the same FriendlyName '{4}'. Remove or rename one of the attributes, or reference the desired type directly..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.Exception_StartupTypeConflict
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The discovered startup type '{0}' conflicts with the type '{1}'. Remove or rename one of the types, or reference the desired type directly..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.FriendlyNameMismatch
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The OwinStartupAttribute.FriendlyName value '{0}' does not match the given value '{1}' in Assembly '{2}'..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.MethodNotFoundInClass
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No '{0}' method was found in class '{1}'..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.NoAssemblyWithStartupClass
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No assembly found containing a Startup or [AssemblyName].Startup class..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.NoOwinStartupAttribute
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to No assembly found containing an OwinStartupAttribute..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.StartupTypePropertyEmpty
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The OwinStartupAttribute.StartupType value is empty in Assembly '{0}'..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.StartupTypePropertyMissing
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The type '{0}' referenced from assembly '{1}' does not define a property 'StartupType' of type 'Type'..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.TypeOrMethodNotFound
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The given type or method '{0}' was not found. Try specifying the Assembly..

member.name: P:SharedResourceNamespace.LoaderResources.UnexpectedMethodSignature
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The '{0}' method on class '{1}' does not have the expected signature 'void {0}(IAppBuilder)'..

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.DataProtection.MachineKeyDataProtectionProvider
member.summary: Used to provide the data protection services that are derived from the MachineKey API. It is the best choice of data protection when you application is hosted by ASP.NET and all servers in the farm are running with the same Machine Key values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.DataProtection.MachineKeyDataProtectionProvider.Create(System.String[])
member.summary: Returns a new instance of IDataProtection for the provider.
member.param: Additional entropy used to ensure protected data may only be unprotected for the correct purposes.
member.returns: An instance of a data protection service

member.name: T:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler
member.summary: Processes requests from System.Web as OWIN requests.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler.#ctor
member.summary: Processes requests using the default OWIN application.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler.BeginProcessRequest(System.Web.HttpContextBase,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)
member.summary: Initiates an asynchronous call to the HTTP handler.
member.param: An System.Web.HttpContextBase object that provides references to intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.
The System.AsyncCallback to call when the asynchronous method call is complete. If callback is null, the delegate is not called.
Any extra data needed to process the request.
member.returns: An System.IAsyncResult that contains information about the status of the process.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler.EndProcessRequest(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Provides an asynchronous process End method when the process ends.
member.param: An System.IAsyncResult that contains information about the status of the process.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Owin.Host.SystemWeb.OwinHttpHandler.IsReusable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the System.Web.IHttpHandler instance.

member.param: The route collection.
The route path to map to the given OWIN application.
The OWIN application entry point.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinPath(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Invokes the System.Action startup delegate to build the OWIN application and then registers a route for it on the given path.
member.param: The route collection.
The route path to map to the given OWIN application.
A System.Action delegate invoked to build the OWIN application.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The URL pattern for the route.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The URL pattern for the route.
The values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The URL pattern for the route.
The values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
A regular expression that specifies valid values for a URL parameter.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Web.Routing.RouteValueDictionary,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The URL pattern for the route.
The values to use if the URL does not contain all the parameters.
A regular expression that specifies valid values for a URL parameter.

Custom values that are passed to the route handler, but which are not used to determine whether the route matches a specific URL pattern. These values are passed to the route handler, where they can be used for processing the request.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.

member.name: M:System.Web.Routing.RouteCollectionExtensions.MapOwinRoute(System.Web.Routing.RouteCollection,System.String,System.String,System.Action{Owin.IAppBuilder})
member.summary: Provides a way to define routes for an OWIN pipeline.
member.param: The route collection.
The name of the route.
The URL pattern for the route.
The method to initialize the pipeline that processes requests for the route.
